game.name: Nuggle
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Nuggle is a delightfully cosy casual puzzle game with 100 levels at launch. It has a simple mechanic but you can quickly become unstuck trying to make sure there are no missing matches. It is unadulterated pure puzzles.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Nuggle is a delightfully cosy casual puzzle game with 100 levels at launch. It has a simple mechanic but you can quickly become unstuck trying to make sure there are no missing matches. It is unadulterated pure puzzles.
